item.title: Webb Telescope Images New Planet — What It Means For Earth 2.0 Search
item.description: For the first time since its launch on Christmas Day 2021, the James Webb Space Telescope has discovered a new exoplanet, TWA 7 b, in the debris disk ...

item.title: Well, ‘Squid Game’ May Not End With Season 3 After All
item.description: Squid Game season 3 airs this friday, but the series finale may given way to even more Squid Game content, according to its creator.

item.title: How A New Wave Of Digital Innovation Is Reshaping Global Enterprises
item.description: Global enterprises face a new inflection point. Emerging technologies are reshaping how companies work; they are redefining what is possible.

item.title: Nomad’s New iPhone Wallet Has Find My And MagSafe Built In
item.description: Snapping a wallet to the back of your iPhone is straightforward, but the new Nomad Leather Mag Wallet had Find My hidden in it, too.

item.title: The Latest Update On ‘We Were Liars’ Season 2 On Amazon Prime Video
item.description: Will We Were Liars be renewed for season 2 on Amazon Prime Video? We have some news on that front that fans may want to know.
